You make a well placed shot or unleash a hail of fire to cover your allies. Make a ranged Strike against a target and select one ally within range of the same attack. If your Strike hits your target, you deal no damage, but the targeted creature becomes @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.Suppressed] and takes a â€“2 circumstance penalty on attacks made against your ally until the end of your next turn.

@UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feat-effects.Item.Effect: Covering Fire]

You can use Covering Fire as a 2-action activity to @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.Area Fire] or @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.Auto-Fire] instead of making a ranged Strike, affecting targets that fail their save.
